name: Plugin All Info
author: wpshopee

sections.description:
Plugin All Info

This plugin provides a simple way to display information about any plugin hosted on the WordPress Plugin Directory. It is also useful for all those who want to display plugin details in their blog posts or pages to remain up to date.

See live demo
sections.installation:
1. In your WordPress admin panel, go to Plugins > New Plugin, search for Plugin all info and click \”Install now\”
  2. Alternatively, download the plugin and upload the contents of ‘plugin-all-info.zip’ to your plugins directory, which usually is ‘/wp-content/plugins/’.
  3. Activate the plugin

sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. In your WordPress admin panel, go to Plugins > New Plugin, search for Plugin all info and click \”Install now\”
  2. Alternatively, download the plugin and upload the contents of ‘plugin-all-info.zip’ to your plugins directory, which usually is ‘/wp-content/plugins/’.
  3. Activate the plugin

short_description: Plugin all info provides a simple way of displaying up-to-date information about specific WordPress Plugin hosted on WP plugin repository.
